variable.name: sxaresult_r
variable.description: Percent density of right breast. The % density is the volume of dense tissue out of the total volume of the breast as calculated by the sxa method.

variable.name: sxaresult_l
variable.description: Percent density of left breast. The % density is the volume of dense tissue out of the total volume of the breast as calculated by the sxa method.

variable.name: dense_volume_r
variable.description: Total density of fibroglandular tissue measured in the left breast
variable.comment: Total dense volume of Right breast in mL

variable.name: dense_volume_l
variable.description: Total density of fibroglandular tissue measured in the right breast
variable.comment: Total dense volume of left breast in mL

variable.name: sxa_avg
variable.description: The average % dense volume between left and right breasts (if either left or right is missing, then the value available is taken as the average). The % density is the volume of dense tissue out of the total volume of the breast as calculated by the sxa method.

variable.name: densevol_avg
variable.description: The average volumetric density between left and right breasts (if either left or right is missing, then the value available is taken as the average)

variable.name: sxa_resid
variable.description: Age and BMI adjusted breast density calculated by regression betwee square-root transformed sxa_avg vs. age and BMI. The sxa_resid represent the residuals of this regression.
